articles.title: Asian Paints Q4 profit jumps 81% to Rs 870 crore, volume and revenue beat estimates - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The board of directors has recommended a final dividend of Rs 14.50 per equity share, taking the total dividend to Rs 17.85 for FY21.
articles.content:
Asian Paints on May 12 reported an 81.1 percent year-on-year growth in net profit to Rs 870 in March 2021 quarter, driven by strong growth in volume and operating income, and low base in Q4FY20.
